stimulusHtml: The integral test can be used to conclude that which of the following statements about the infinite series ∑n=1∞nn2+1 is true?
choicesHtml: The series converges, and the terms of the series have limit 0.
The series diverges, and the terms of the series have limit 0.
The series converges, and the terms of the series do not have limit 0.
The series diverges, and the terms of the series do not have limit 0.
